remarks: Closure of the quotient by a unitic polynomial.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
q1pcl.q $e |- Q = ( quot1p ` R ) $.
q1pcl.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
q1pcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
q1pcl.c $e |- C = ( Unic1p ` R ) $.
q1pcl $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. C ) -> ( F Q G ) e. B ) $.
